SQL.LOAD: SELECT entity, attribute, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, entity_attribute_id FROM elp_entity_attribute WHERE entity_attribute_id = :entity_attribute_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_entity_attribute SET entity = :entity, attribute = :attribute, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE entity_attribute_id = :entity_attribute_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_entity_attribute ( entity, attribute, effective, expiration, created_by, entity_attribute_id ) VALUES ( :entity, :attribute, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :entity_attribute_id )
